input.sentences: i went to a convention today .
i met somebody that i thought i never would get the chance to meet .
i took crazy pictures with all of my friends .
i had a really awesome time at the convention .
output.sentences: Barry was psyched for the convention, and glad to see his old colleague, Paul had come too.
Their shared passion for food came out over the refreshment table, and it felt like no time has passed at all.
They were surprised to find their old IT technician there, along with Julie and John.
John still had a way of playing up to the camera, which made everyone laugh.
Barry had an awesome time taking pictures of his old team on his iphone.
